metadata.Title: CVE-2017-10791 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: There is an Integer overflow in the hash_int function of the libpspp library in GNU PSPP before 0.11.0. For example, a crash was observed within the library code when attempting to convert invalid SPSS data into CSV format. A crafted input will lead to a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: pspp package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1').
